data.title: Murder by Meta -- A Crossword Puzzle Mystery by Matt Gaffney — Kickstarter
data.name: Matt Gaffney
data.description: Daphne Pratt was big in the puzzle world -- until her murder at a crossword tournament. Solve the puzzles to unmask her killer.
